3: I can't believe there's such a large cave here...
Walking into the entrance, everyone arrives at a strange underground world.
There's a production line over there...
That must be the where our enemies came from... No wonder the numbers don't match up.
That doesn't make sense, though. Why would such a large cave go undiscovered for this long...?
Must be some sort of interference. Look up there—the strange lights. They must be some sort of signal jammer.
They'd put so much effort into burying their past mistakes and building this military base, instead of trying to rebuild the ARU...

2: Because they had war in mind.

3: Yeah... The captain said that Amberia and the bionics were built for war from the start.
From the looks of this cave, you can see the true intent of the ARU's leadership. They never swayed from their belief that war was the final solution.
Yeah, Diana. All in the past.
Whatever the past mistakes, let's try our best to make amends.
Oh, how very deep and all, Forest Guards. Ah, 【kuroname】, you as well.
Oh, wha... Oh. Wait. I don't think we ever met.
Well, well.
An unfamiliar female voice warbles through the air, nauseous and muffled like noise.
Self-intros are annoooyiiing, but I guess I'll still go through with it... My name is Lamia, an Ascendant.
First Alpha, now Lamia? Do you Ascendants think you can stroll in and out of the ARU, just as you please?
Well, we just needed something here... That's all.

2: Are you the one behind all of this?

3: Oh, you are such a funny little tart... Didn't you just arrive at your answer? It's all the ARU's fault.
Whether it's the bionics that are attacking the ARU,or the Amberia buried in this place—I've got nothing to do with 'em.
I'm just a little spectator. That's all.
Oh come on, little pumpkin, you know the answer.
Which means... you have Atiel.
I'm only here for Amberia. We've got enough juice, so after she's fully charged, we can make her go beep-boop with the code, and... voila!
Then Amberia will be under my control. After which...

4: Can't you just use the virus to control her?

3: ...I'm not tryna tell you, you're the brutes who barged in on me talking to myself! Hmph!
...Asks all the wrong questions—check.
Lamia cuts the broadcast. Bionics begin pouring out of the dark recesses of the cavern.
Urgh—
Wait, these bionics... They've been corrupted!
Corrupted and Ascendants... Is that Lamia trying to turn the ARU into Kowloong...?
We're here to prevent that from happening. Let's break through their forces and continue downward, Commandant.
As you are about to move, the ice cave begins to rumble.
It's a trap?!
